snippet.title: FIFA 14 PS2 Gameplay HD (PCSX2)
snippet.description:
FIFA 14 PS2 Gameplay
Release Date: September 23, 2013
Platforms: Android, iOS, Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, PlayStation Portable, PlayStation Vita, Wii, Xbox 360, Xbox One
_____________________________________________
NOTE: (X) Disable the "MTVU (Multi-Threaded microVU1)" speedhack
_____________________________________________
PCSX2 Settings:
Renderer: OpenGL (Hardware)
Interlacing (F5): Auto
Texture Filtering: Bilinear (PS2)
Internal Resolution: 5x Native
Anisotropic Filtering: 16x
Mipmapping: Basic (Fast)
CRC Hack Level: Automatic (Default)
_____________________________________________
(✓) Enable HW Hacks:
(✓) Half-pixel Offset: Special (Texture)
_____________________________________________
Requested by: VTI Playz
_____________________________________________
My PC Specs:
CPU: Intel Core i7-4790K
GPU: GeForce GTX 1070
Ram: 16GB
OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Pro
_____________________________________________
Please leave a comment and rate it. :)
Enjoy !
